data.eml:eml: A new species of Nyctibatrachus Boulenger (Amphibia: Anura: Nyctibatrachidae) from the surroundings of Bhadra Wildlife Sanctuary, Western Ghats, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bhatta, Gopalakrishna (2008): A new species of Nyctibatrachus Boulenger (Amphibia: Anura: Nyctibatrachidae) from the surroundings of Bhadra Wildlife Sanctuary, Western Ghats, India. Zootaxa 1914: 45-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274551
